Articles.Content: I've been lurking the forums for a while now but only now have I decided to make an account. I'm only 14, and am quite interested in physics, mathematics, and astronomy. As for creative work, I play music and make pixel art from time to time. I've been playing KSP for something like half a year, but I definitely haven't done as many things on it as I would like to. I'm also a brony. So yeah. Hi. ^^

Welcome to the forums!

I'd highly recommend that you check out the Drawing Board (link in my sig) while you're here. It's mainly intended for beginning players, but there are a number of player aids there for players of all skill levels to use. (I'd also recommend that you take a look at the Atomic Rockets site close to the bottom of the list -- it's mainly about real-world rocketry, but much of the basics can also be applied to KSP -- and it's a fun read, to boot ). The people who frequent the How To section of the forums will also be willing to answer any questions you may have.

Happy landings!
